function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on mental health in building occupant studies","Impact":"Increased risk of depression, anxiety, and stress among occupants","Mitigation":"Conduct studies that focus on social well-being and mental health of occupants, and consider the impact of building design on mental health","Technologies":"Health and well-being surveys, mental health assessments, social well-being measurement tools","People":"Building occupants, researchers, and professionals","Owner":"Researchers and professionals in the field of building design and construction"},{"Description":"Neglect of interdisciplinary collaboration in promoting occupant health","Impact":"Ineffective collaboration between building practitioners, health professionals, and data scientists, leading to suboptimal occupant health outcomes","Mitigation":"Facilitate discussions and establish a common vocabulary, data collection protocols, and analysis methods for occupant health in buildings","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, data collection and analysis tools, communication technologies","People":"Building practitioners, health professionals, data scientists, and researchers","Owner":"Building practitioners, health professionals, and data scientists"},{"Description":"Failure to consider the trade-off and synergies between energy efficiency, sustainability, and occupant health","Impact":"Unintended negative consequences on occupant well-being and sustainability goals","Mitigation":"Investigate the trade-off and synergies between energy efficiency, sustainability, and occupant health, and consider the effect of extreme events on occupant well-being","Technologies":"Energy modeling tools, sustainability assessment frameworks, occupant health impact assessments","People":"Building professionals, researchers, and sustainability experts","Owner":"Researchers, building professionals, and sustainability experts"}]}
